channel.title: Links on spook's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Links on spook's blog

item.title: random links 1
item.description: Collections of random cool links I’ve stumbled across. Kerberosity Killed the Domain: An Offensive Kerberos Overview: Kerebos authenication is hard to understand, but this article is easy to read. It features very pretty pictures and is easy to understand. It is a good read for anyone looking to understand kerberos related offensive security techniques. How Developers Stop Learning: Rise of the Expert Beginner: A blog post that explains how some people can lose the will to keep learning.
